title: Tender for the Supply of Biphasic Isophane Insulin BP 1000/IU/10ml (Human 30% + Isophane 70%) (400,000 vials) MSD/P/022/11/S - DHS/(C)P/709/2011 SR NO. 075089
decision_details: - Cabinet approval was granted to award the above procurement to the lowest responsive bidder M/s. Novo Nordisk Als, Denmark at a total C&F price of US$ 1000,000.00 (LKR 112,689,680.00).
